text: Pavlo Ivanovych Kotovenko (; born 25 March 1979 in Lviv) is a Ukrainian retired football player and coach. ==References== Category:1979 births Category:Living people Category:Ukrainian footballers Category:FC Lviv (1992) players Category:FC Karpaty-2 Lviv players Category:FC Rotor Volgograd players Category:Russian Premier League players Category:Ukrainian expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Russia Category:FC Mordovia Saransk players Category:FC Obolon-Brovar Kyiv players Category:Ukrainian football managers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Pavlo Kotovenko
